title: Canada
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,048 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 900L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and X
description: This fascinating book explores many facets of Canada, the second-largest country in the world. Take your students on a trip through the pages to learn more about this amazing country.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
